> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight felt an incredible pain. in her mind all made sense... The strane
> behavior of who she belived that was her husbads, the words of Guileart, the
> misterious amnesia of Rodimus... All had sense now, she risked her life for
> an imposter and worse, two maximals died for her fault and reckless actions

<NEW>

While it was possible that NIGHTLIGHT had been fooled by DARK RODIMUS,
it would seem that DARK RODIMUS believed he was RODIMUS as well. All
his movements and memories appeared to be the same. It was only his
recent memories, the ones after they had rescued RODIMUS that last
time from HYDRAS that seemed to differ.

Also the MAXIMALS that NIGHLIGHT were saying were dead were beginning
to stir. Perhaps they were not dead but were only in a deep stasis
lock. STAMPY's optics flickered for a moment as SHRAPEDGE actually
shifted a foot. They may not be dead . . . although with the damage
they had sustained they were in no condition to do anything but just
lay there.

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson turns to the female figure with a calm look of disappointment.
> " I got no answer from either one of them.  Instead they fight each other
> mindlessly.  I would like to go but how can I when there is no sense of
> responsibility from either one of them?  How can I leave knowing how
> unstable this situation has become?  I'm sorry, but without that sense of
> stability I can not leave.  No,  I will not let it go any further.   It
> has to end now.
>
> He still had strength in his tail.  He attempts to put in one strong slap
> at the wall of the cave.
>
> " IT ENDS NOW"
>
> Roars Tucson in one final effort to make a difference.

<NEW>

The female looked at TUSCON, "He told me that you would be like this."
She was pointing at RODIMUS, the one that was in the accustomed red
and yellow motif.

BIG CONVOY walked forward, "Yeah, what did you expect, for them to
have a 20 minute conversation with you, this is a battle!" To
punctuate the statement CONVOY shot down two of the SHARKTICONS coming
at them!

"Yeah, plus when was the last time you ever heard of the real Matrix
being black and purple?!?" LEO PRIME said as he took cover with TUSCON
and BIG CONVOY. "You should have your answer."

That was when MAGMATRON turned to look at TUSCON, "So you want more?"
He smiled maliciously as he pulled out a large and wicked looking
sword. As MAGMATRON had geown to nealry 20' in height, his sword was
nearly as tall as TUSCON himself was! "Come, come and taste death!" he
swung the sword menacingly!

Meanwhile DARK RODIMUS and RODIMUS fought seemingly oblivious to the
rest of the battle around them.

RODIMUS sent a crushing blow to the side of DARK RODIMUS' helmet, only
to have it block by the mech almost effortlessly. "You need to come
trained to fight!" He said, an evil smile across his face. With an
open handed snapping attack to RODIMUS' chest, DARK RODIMUS sent him
sliding across the floor.

SLIDING across the floor RODIMUS came to a stop as he looked back at
DARK RODIMUS. "Oh I do!" As they both ran at each other again!

Also on the floor the larger battle was taking place, SHARKTICONS
coming at DINOBOT and SKYSHADOW, their numbers quite large.

RAT TRAP and QUICKSTRIDE also faced SHARKTICONS that came at them,
their weapons firing at them with powerful blasts!

However in the center of all things, hidden under the cover of the
battle SABERBACK came over to NIGHTLIGHT and looked down at her. "So
you are the treasure that those two are fighting over." He was of
course talking about the RODIMUS' who were fighting in the background.

His voice was pitched too low for the others to hear except for
NIGHTLIGHT herself.

"Oh, have no doubt, your dark companion believes he is the real
Rodimus . . . because he is . . . copied right down to the last techno
engram." SABERBACK smiled.

SABERBACK gestured back at RODIMUS, "and he will fight to the death."
He chuckled evilly. "But you my pretty." He said as he reached down to
pick up NIGHTLIGHT. "I wonder how much of a treasure you can truly
be?"

(TAG)

- Preston
